column4: i just tried to set up xgl on another machine with a firegl v3100 and i copied my xorg.conf file from my other machine but "ati" was still showing up on glxinfo, so i removed xserver-org-ati and now x wont start right.. any idea how i get it back?
whats the apt-get syntax to 'search' for a package name
apt-cache show foo is useful after :)
